title: 60s Czech movie "Closely Watched Trains" titles
content:
Hi everyone. I was watching this Czech film from the '60's called "Closely Watched Trains" and the title credits were in an awesome comic-esque face. Could someone identify it?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [closely\_watched\_trains\_title.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110227003046/http:/typophile.com/files/closely_watched_trains_title.jpg) | 47 KB |
author: basicframework

comments.content:
This probably would have been done by hand. There might be something similar out there.

- Lex
That is really great. Unfortunately I don't think you'll find anything like it. But that's one of the things that makes it so great.
It's handwritten, watch the e, a and s. I like it a lot.
